edu.umaryland.igs.idea
Class IDEAConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  edu.umaryland.igs.idea.IDEAConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class IDEAConfiguration
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Serializable

IDEAConfiguration encapsulates all the configuration for a particular run of IDEA, including the parameter sets. Configurations may be loaded and saved either in PAML's .ctl format (which preserves only the PAML parameters) or in the alterate .idea format (which preserves all settings).

Written:

Copyright (C) 2006, Amy Egan and Joana C. Silva.

All rights reserved.

Author:
Amy Egan

Constructor Detail

IDEAConfiguration

public IDEAConfiguration(PAMLParameterSet pamlParams,
                         ParameterSet aParams)
This constructs a IDEAConfiguration from the specified parameter sets and then creates the visual groupings.

Parameters:
pamlParams - the set of all parameter read from the .ctl file
aParams - the set of all other parameters

IDEAConfiguration

public IDEAConfiguration(String filename)
                  throws InvalidFileFormatException,
                         FileNotFoundException,
                         IOException
This constructs a IDEAConfiguration from the specified file. The file can be in either .ctl or .idea format.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to load
Throws:
InvalidFileFormatException - if the file is malformatted
FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist, is a directory or cannot be opened
IOException

void setCloneConfig()
Deprecated. 

configurationFileFilter

public static FileFilter configurationFileFilter(int fileFormat)
The configurationFileFilter method returns a file filter which accepts files of the specified format. Directories are also accepted.

Parameters:
fileFormat - the only configuration-file format to accept when this filter is selected (PAML_MODE or IDEA_MODE)
Returns:
a file filter which accepts only files of the specified type (in addition to directories)

load

public void load(String filename)
          throws InvalidFileFormatException,
                 FileNotFoundException,
                 IOException
The load method reads the parameters for this configuration from the specified file. The file can be in either .ctl or .idea format.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to load
Throws:
InvalidFileFormatException - if the file is malformatted
FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist, is a directory or cannot be opened
IOException

save

public void save(String filename)
          throws FileNotFoundException,
                 IOException
The save method saves the parameters for this configuration to the specified file. The file can be in either .ctl format or .idea format.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to load
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if the file is a directory, cannot be created or cannot be opened
IOException - if some other I/O error occurs

setRunMode

public void setRunMode(String runMode)
The setRunMode method sets the running mode for this configuration.

Parameters:
runMode - the running mode

isFullConfiguration

public boolean isFullConfiguration()
The isFullConfiguration method returns true if the running mode is IDEA_MODE.

Returns:
true in IDEA_MODE; false in PAML_MODE

isValidConfig

public static boolean isValidConfig(String fn,
                                    int configurationMode)
This isValidConfig method returns true if the specified file name ends with the correct extension for the specified mode.

Parameters:
fn - the filename to test for validity
configurationMode - the mode to assume for testing
Returns:
true if the filename has the correct extension for the mode

isValidConfig

public static boolean isValidConfig(String fn)
This isValidConfig method returns true if the specified file name ends with the correct extension for any running mode.

Parameters:
fn - the filename to test for validity
Returns:
true if the filename has a valid extension for a configuration file

pamlParameters

public ParameterSet pamlParameters()
The pamlParameters method returns the set of all parameters read from the .ctl file.

Returns:
the set of all parameters read from the .ctl file

additionalParameters

public ParameterSet additionalParameters()
The additionalParameters method returns the set of all parameters not read from the .ctl file.

Returns:
the set of all parameters not read from the .ctl file

getParameter

public Parameter getParameter(String name)
The getParameter method looks up the given name in pamlParameters or, if it is not found there, in additionalParameters. If the parameter is found, it is returned; otherwise, null is returned.

Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to look up
Returns:
the PAML parameter with the given name, or the IDEA parameter with the given name, or null

initializeAdditionalParameters

protected void initializeAdditionalParameters(boolean baseml)
The initializeAdditionalParameters method initializes the additional parameters; this depends on the PAML parameters.

Parameters:
baseml - true if the PAML program should be set to baseml

requireParameters

protected void requireParameters(String[] requiredParameters)
The requireParameters method checks that every parameter in the supplied list of required parameters exists and has a non-null value. If any required parameter does not exist or has a null value, the user is given an error message, and a default configuration file is loaded. If a default configuration file cannot be loaded (perhaps because that file is itself invalid, IDEA terminates.

initializeActionListeners

protected void initializeActionListeners()
The initializeActionListeners method adds action listeners to various parameters; each of these action listeners performs an action other than input validation on the parameter to which it is added, such as disabling another parameter or updating its value.

addInputVerifiers

protected void addInputVerifiers()
The addInputVerifiers method adds input verifiers for several parameters. These verifiers are not saved with configurations; old saved configurations must conform to new validation requirements.

createVisualGroupings

protected void createVisualGroupings()
The createVisualGroupings method creates the visual groupings out of parameters in the two basic parameter sets (PAML parameters and additional parameters).

setIDEAMode

private void setIDEAMode(String ideaMode)
The setIDEAMode method enables either the single-dataset or the multiple-dataset parameters based on the IDEA mode and updates the values for seqfile, treefile and outfile.

Parameters:
ideaMode - the value of the "IDEA mode" parameter, either "Single Dataset" or "Multi-Dataset"
